p: At the Quzhou site, the soil texture is clay loam, with a bulk density of 1.36 g cm −3 for the 0–30-cm soil layer. The chemical properties of the 0–30-cm soil layer were as follows: organic matter content, 14.2 g kg −1; total N, 0.83 g kg −1; Olsen-P, 7.2 mg kg −1; NH 4OAc-K, 125 mg kg −1; and pH, 8.3.
